gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bucks 111, Hornets 99
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bucks defeated the Hornets, 111-99. Giannis Antetokounmpo recorded 24 points, 10 rebounds, and five assists for the Bucks, with Malik Beasley adding 19 points (5-9 3PM) and two rebounds in the victory. Brandon Miller tallied 21 points and seven rebounds for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Bucks have won 4 in a row and improve to 39-21, while the Hornets fall to 15-44.
